game.name: Stickman Warriors
game.description:
Do you like to be on the physics-based fun-addicting platforms where you have to fight against the odds to the last breath? If yes, Stickman Warriors game is definitely for you. Stickman is also highly popular for its glorious warrior skills. And, the magnificent struggle of this brave warrior continues with a brand new action packed game where there is no space for the gravity. Join the battlefield of warriors and show the world that you are also skilled enough to save the humanity. 

Your objective in this one of the best fighting games for kids is to defeat all your enemies to clear each level. Initially, the number of your rivals might be a little bit low, but they will increase as you progress in the game. Find your joystick and get ready to kill your enemies before they destroy you. Remember this is a modified gravity field where you have to handle your character through the joystick. You will notice that the movements are pretty slower, so try to be extra careful while moving carefully in the area you have given in this cool stickman fighter game. 

You are free to kick and slap your enemies. Do not forget to kick off their heads to get the extra advantage in the game. Use your arms and legs to attack your opponent and clear each level as fast as you can to score higher. Keep attacking the joints on your opponent and you will see that he will lose his joints son. Kick and punch their way through different challenging and engaging 100+ levels in this html5 battle game. Good luck to play like a courageous warrior and become a winner in this fun online realistic ragdoll physics game.
